page.title: 17Dad's Diary (Continued)
page.content: 11.00am. Played games with Rebecca and Amy outside (rounders and football.) 12.30pm. Had lunch which was fish, peas, potatoes and tomatoes. 1.30pm. Went for a walk with the family and friends to the West of England Aquatics to see the Koi Carp. 2.30pm. Arrived back home and decided to cut the back and front lawns. 4.30pm. Had tea and then went outside to finish cutting the grass. 5.30pm. Got changed and went for a run around Winterbourne with a friend of mine. 6.30pm. Arrived back home completely exhausted, showered and changed and watched television for the rest of the evening. 10.30pm. Went to bed.
